1.0.name: wordpress/meta-manager-eng
1.0.description: While publishing a post/page, you can set: a) meta-description tag (if you leave that field empty, then the meta-description will use the first ~50 words of a post.) b) meta-keywords (if you leave it empty, then it wont be filled automatically) c) meta .

1.1.name: wordpress/meta-manager-eng
1.1.description: While publishing a post/page, you can set: a) meta-description tag (if you leave that field empty, then the meta-description will use the first ~50 words of a post.) b) meta-keywords (if you leave it empty, then it wont be filled automatically) c) meta .
